擥字的基本解释

擥
lǎn
同“揽”。

擥字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lǎn］
［《廣韻》盧敢切，上敢，來。］
亦作“擥1”。亦作“1”。“揽1”的繁体字。
(1)总揽，一把抓。
(2)执持；拉住。
(3)收取。
(4)采摘。
(5)延揽，结纳。
(6)指约集，拉拢。
(7)招引，招惹。
(8)拉到自己这边或自己身上；包揽。
(9)围抱，搂。
(10)把松散的东西聚拢。
(11)通“覽”。看；观赏。

擥字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　擥； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页460第06
【唐韻】盧敢切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】魯敢切，?音覽。【說文】撮持也。【禮·樂記·濫以立會疏】濫，猶擥也。擥然有積聚之意。【蜀志·諸葛亮傳註】夙興夜寐，罰二十以上，皆親擥焉。【管子·弟子職】飯必捧擥。　又手擥取也。【屈原·離騷】夕擥洲之宿莽。【註】擥，采也。或作㩜。又作攬。

擥字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
擥字的起名意思

暂无。

Chu
Basic explanation of words
Chu
lǎn
The same as "holding".
Chu
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lǎn］
["Guangyun" Lu Gan cut, go up, come. ]
Also known as "擥1". Also known as "1". The traditional characters of "親1".
(1) Overall, grab it.
(2) Hold; hold.
(3) Collection.
(4) Picking.
(5) Solicitation and settlement.
(6) Refers to gathering and drawing together.
(7) To attract and provoke.
(8) Pull to one's side or on one's own body; take care of.
(9) Hug and hug.
(10) Gather loose things together.
(11) Through "View". Look; watch.
Chu

[Mao Collection] [Hand Character Department] 　擥; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 460 06
[Tang Yun] Lu Gan cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Lu Gan cut,? [Said the text] also summarized. [Li·Le Ji·Indiscriminately to stand up to the meeting】Indiscriminately, it is still too. Sui Ran has the meaning of accumulation. [Shu Zhi · Zhuge Liang Biography] Su Xing night sleep, fines more than 20, all professed. [Guanzi·Discipleship] Fans must be held.　Take it again. [Qu Yuan·Lisao] The Sumang of Xizhizhou. [Note] Thu, pick it too. Or make 㩜. Again.
